vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment to Planned Development District No. 822, on property bound by Forney Road, Wimbleton Way, Chariot Drive, and Lomax Drive
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval, subject to an amended development plan and amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval, subject to an amended development plan and amended conditions
Z234-322(LC)
